meta.description: Minimize the cost of transferring medical supplies between hospitals to meet their needs during a health crisis.

sets.name: HOSPITALS
sets.description: Hospitals involved in the supply distribution

params.name: initial_supplies
params.description: Initial supplies available at each hospital

params.name: transfer_cost
params.description: Cost to transfer supplies between hospitals

vars.name: transfer
vars.description: Amount of supplies transferred from one hospital to another

objective.name: min_total_transfer_cost
objective.expr: sum(transfer_cost[i][j] * transfer[i][j] for i in HOSPITALS for j in HOSPITALS if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of transferring supplies between hospitals

constraints.name: supply_balance_1
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['1'] + transfer['2']['1'] + transfer['3']['1'] + transfer['4']['1'] - transfer['1']['2'] - transfer['1']['3'] - transfer['1']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 1 has the required supplies

constraints.name: supply_balance_2
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['2'] + transfer['1']['2'] + transfer['3']['2'] + transfer['4']['2'] - transfer['2']['1'] - transfer['2']['3'] - transfer['2']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 2 has the required supplies

constraints.name: supply_balance_3
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['3'] + transfer['1']['3'] + transfer['2']['3'] + transfer['4']['3'] - transfer['3']['1'] - transfer['3']['2'] - transfer['3']['4']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 3 has the required supplies

constraints.name: supply_balance_4
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_supplies['4'] + transfer['1']['4'] + transfer['2']['4'] + transfer['3']['4'] - transfer['4']['1'] - transfer['4']['2'] - transfer['4']['3']
constraints.description: Ensure Hospital 4 has the required supplies
